data.title: Child's Sinister Jester Costume X-Large (12-14) - Creepy Coolness for Your Little Joker -
data.body: This Sinister Jester Costume in X-Large (12-14) is perfect for your mischievous little one. With its eerie design and playful flair, it's sure to turn heads at any Halloween party or costume event. The attention to detail and quality craftsmanship make it stand out from the crowd. Let your child embrace their inner jester and bring some spooky fun to the festivities with this awesome costume.
